summary: This is a brief internal email from July 7, 2019, discussing press plans regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The sender asks whether the Office of Public Affairs (OPA) needs to be notified about potential press statements that night.

events.title: Internal discussion of Epstein press plans
events.description: An internal email discusses whether the Office of Public Affairs (OPA) needs to be notified about press plans or a statement regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 7, 2019, shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
It shows internal government coordination regarding public statements about Epstein.
The sender inquires about notifying the Office of Public Affairs (OPA) about press plans.
The context suggests active case management and media strategy around the Epstein investigation.
